name: Lowa Renegade Gore-Tex Light Hiking Shoes - Men's
description: Built tough to stand up to rugged terrain, and lighter than taller models for fast and light hikes. The supportive frame stabilizes your feet when carrying load, and the membrane ensures your feet stay dry when the trail turns muddy.Durable leather upper with Gore-Tex® waterproof-breathable membrane.Support frame wraps lower foot for support.Dual-density midsole cushions and comforts.Soft nylon stabilizer provides torsional rigidity.Vibram® Evo Trac® outsole with multi-directional lugs for traction uphill and down.
